sentences.english: The score had the possibility to be worse much a point, but each point has nipped .
sentences.chinese: 比分有可能差得多了一点，但每一分都去咬了。

sentences.english: “Two years ago, Brazil was growing much less than Chile, ” he says.
sentences.chinese: 两年前，巴西的发展要比智利差得多，“他说。
